seed_pair.target: It isn't true that anyone can win the game.
seed_pair.known: No es verdad que cualquiera pueda ganar el juego.

seed_pair.target: She won't listen to every word you say.
seed_pair.known: No escuchará cada palabra que dices.

seed_pair.target: Let's not go outside in this dreadful weather.
seed_pair.known: No vayamos afuera con este clima espantoso.

seed_pair.target: He made a promise that he wouldn't choose the wrong job.
seed_pair.known: Hizo una promesa de que no elegiría el trabajo equivocado.

seed_pair.target: I used to think that being crazy was bad.
seed_pair.known: Solía pensar que ser loco era malo.

seed_pair.target: I don't want to seem as though I don't care.
seed_pair.known: No quiero parecer como si no me importara.

seed_pair.target: I don't mind if you want to leave without the car.
seed_pair.known: No me importa si quieres irte sin el coche.
